All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbilityMedic
    Ability Medic: Heals the first one in the crew that has health below 50 except the medic itself
    AbilityScientist
    Ability class that handles Scientist's abilities
    ActivateAbility
    Further filters the type of crew member and activates their respective abilities
    AddGameScore
    A helper class to be called to add a game score
    AlienPirates
    Alien Pirates event has 33% chance to be picked by Random Event handler A random item may be picked out by the alien pirates (including ship part) but very unlikely The item to be stolen has a chance based on the item's drop chance
    AsteroidEvent
    This class contains what will happen when the player encounters an Asteroid Belt.
    Bread
    The class implementation of the item Bread
    Captain
    Represents the Captain type of crew member.
    Chips
    The class implementation of the item Chips
    Coin
    The class implementation of the item Coin
    Crew
    Represents the Medic type of crew member.
    CrewMember
    Represents the abstract class of crew members.
    CrewSelector
    A utility tool to select a crew from the Crew instance with available moves using pop dialog with radio buttons, which in turn, you can use getCrew() method to get the selected Crew.
    CrewStatus
    Represents the status of all crew members
    EnergyDrink
    The class implementation of the item EnergyDrink
    Engineer
    Represents the Engineer type of crew member.
    Environment
    Represents the Environment of the game Contains all the planets and the current planet the player is into
    GameManager
    Control center of a players game.
    GameNavigation
    Represent a JPanel displaying multiple buttons used for navigating the main content modules of the game.
    GameOver
    Represent the results of the game
    GuiManager
    Control center for the core GUI functionality, primarily acting as a middle man between the main screen and content panes.
    IceCream
    The class implementation of the item IceCream
    Inventory
    The Inventory class of the game which holds the data for all available items for the player
    InventoryDisplay
    Represents the inventory of the player
    Item
    The interface for all item class
    ItemWheel
    Random item generator based on weight probabilities
    LargeHP
    The class implementation of the item LargeHP
    Main
    The main class to run the Interstellar Adventure!
    MainScreen
    Represents the MainScreen (View) controller
    Meat
    The class implementation of the item Meat
    Medic
    Represents the Medic type of crew member.
    OutpostContent
    Represents the Outpost (Store) of the game
    Pilot
    Represents the Pilot type of crew member.
    Planet
    Represents an planet found in the game environment.
    PlanetMain
    Represents the Planet in the game
    RandomEvent
    Initializing random event 40% chance for each event: {Space Plague, Alien Pirates}
    Scientist
    Represents the Scientist type of crew member.
    Scout
    Represents the Scout type of crew member.
    SelectedIconListener
    Represents the selected ship icon on the setup screen
    SetupScreen
    Represents and application window that will act as the main entry point to the game, where a user can set the game parameters when starting a new game.
    ShipPart
    The class implementation of the item ShipPart
    ShipStatus
    Represents the status of all crew members
    SmallHP
    The class implementation of the item SmallHP
    SpacePills
    The class implementation of the item SpacePills
    SpacePlague
    Space Plague event has 33% chance to be picked by Random Event handler A random crew member may be picked out to be infected All crew members has an equal chance to be infected
    SpaceShip
    Represents the Medic type of crew member.
    TravelCrewSelect
    Represents the selection of crew to travel to a planet
    TravelPlanetSelect
    Represents the selection of planet to travel to
    Water
    The class implementation of the item Water
